SEARCH
Package com.vrm.vehicle

Class Fleet

java.lang.Object
com.vrm.vehicle.Fleet
public class Fleet extends Object
Stores and manages all company cars. Handles vehicle creation and update. Stores fleet in arrays by type of vehicle.
